name: Minty Fruit Tea
effect:
Increases all party members' DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
description: A cooling and refreshing drink. The invigorating tea and the sweet-sour taste of fruit blend together and energize your taste buds, and before you know it, you've already drained your entire cup.

suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
suspicious.description: A cooling and refreshing drink. The very first sip sends your teeth practically fleeing from the onslaught of the sour taste. The light sweetness has been utterly usurped by a tyrannical astringency. Is this really fruit tea?

normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
normal.description: A cooling and refreshing drink. The invigorating tea and the sweet-sour taste of fruit blend together and energize your taste buds, and before you know it, you've already drained your entire cup.

delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
delicious.description: A cooling and refreshing drink. The sweet flavor of the tea combines with light, clear floral notes on one hand, and tangles with a dash of fruity on the other, filling your mouth and throat with their aroma. Wait a moment — why are there only ice cubes left in the cup?
